mapper.select:
BEGIN DECLARE @COMP_CODE NVARCHAR(08) , @DIV_CODE NVARCHAR(08) , @TABLE_ID NVARCHAR(20) , @PREFIX NVARCHAR(03) , @BASIS_DATE NVARCHAR(08) , @ITEM_CODE NVARCHAR(20) , @sAUTO_NUM NVARCHAR(24)
, @TmpMaxSeq NUMERIC(6, 0) , @MaxSeq NUMERIC(10, 0) , @NumFormat NVARCHAR(01) , @FixSeq NUMERIC(5, 0) --20181123 추가 , @LotInitial NVARCHAR(02)
SET @COMP_CODE = #{COMP_CODE} SET @DIV_CODE = #{DIV_CODE} SET @TABLE_ID = 'LOT_NO' SET @BASIS_DATE = #{INOUT_DATE} SET @ITEM_CODE = #{ITEM_CODE} SET @sAUTO_NUM = ''
SET @BASIS_DATE = CASE WHEN ISNULL(@BASIS_DATE, '') = '' THEN CONVERT(NVARCHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112) ELSE @BASIS_DATE END
-- 20181123 추가: 공통코드(Z011)에서 LOT INITIAL 확인 SELECT @LotInitial = SUB_CODE FROM BSA100T WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE COMP_CODE = @COMP_CODE AND MAIN_CODE = 'Z011' AND REF_CODE1 = 'Y'
-- 20181123 추가: LotInitial = '1'일 때 로직 추가 IF @LotInitial = '1' --한국: R, L, T, S, F / 베트남: A, B, C, D, M BEGIN -- 공통코드(Z008) : ITEM_CODE에 따라 구분자 설정 SELECT @PREFIX = CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(@ITEM_CODE, 1, 2) = 'JM' THEN 'R' --품목코드 'JM'으로 시작하면 'R' WHEN RIGHT(@ITEM_CODE, CASE WHEN CHARINDEX('-', REVERSE(@ITEM_CODE))-1 < 0 THEN 0 ELSE CHARINDEX('-', REVERSE(@ITEM_CODE))-1 END) = '' THEN 'F' WHEN RIGHT(@ITEM_CODE, CASE WHEN CHARINDEX('-', REVERSE(@ITEM_CODE))-1 < 0 THEN 0 ELSE CHARINDEX('-', REVERSE(@ITEM_CODE))-1 END) = '01' THEN 'L' WHEN RIGHT(@ITEM_CODE, CASE WHEN CHARINDEX('-', REVERSE(@ITEM_CODE))-1 < 0 THEN 0 ELSE CHARINDEX('-', REVERSE(@ITEM_CODE))-1 END) = '02' THEN 'T' WHEN RIGHT(@ITEM_CODE, CASE WHEN CHARINDEX('-', REVERSE(@ITEM_CODE))-1 < 0 THEN 0 ELSE CHARINDEX('-', REVERSE(@ITEM_CODE))-1 END) = '03' THEN 'S' ELSE 'ERROR' END END ELSE BEGIN -- 공통코드(Z008) : ITEM_CODE에 따라 구분자 설정 SELECT @PREFIX = CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(@ITEM_CODE, 1, 1) = 'M' THEN 'A' --품목코드 'M'으로 시작하면 'A' WHEN RIGHT(@ITEM_CODE, CASE WHEN CHARINDEX('-', REVERSE(@ITEM_CODE))-1 < 0 THEN 0 ELSE CHARINDEX('-', REVERSE(@ITEM_CODE))-1 END) = '' THEN 'M' WHEN RIGHT(@ITEM_CODE, CASE WHEN CHARINDEX('-', REVERSE(@ITEM_CODE))-1 < 0 THEN 0 ELSE CHARINDEX('-', REVERSE(@ITEM_CODE))-1 END) = '01' THEN 'B' WHEN RIGHT(@ITEM_CODE, CASE WHEN CHARINDEX('-', REVERSE(@ITEM_CODE))-1 < 0 THEN 0 ELSE CHARINDEX('-', REVERSE(@ITEM_CODE))-1 END) = '02' THEN 'C' WHEN RIGHT(@ITEM_CODE, CASE WHEN CHARINDEX('-', REVERSE(@ITEM_CODE))-1 < 0 THEN 0 ELSE CHARINDEX('-', REVERSE(@ITEM_CODE))-1 END) = '03' THEN 'D' ELSE 'ERROR' END END
-- 공통코드(B067) : 자동채번자릿수(최종순번)에 의해 자릿수 설정 아니고 lot_no 채번은 무조건 5자리 SET @FixSeq = 99999
UPDATE A SET @TmpMaxSeq = A.last_seq + 1 , @MaxSeq = A.last_seq = CASE WHEN A.last_seq + 1 > @FixSeq THEN A.last_seq ELSE A.last_seq + 1 END FROM BAUTONOT A WITH (ROWLOCK) WHERE A.comp_code = @COMP_CODE AND A.div_code = @DIV_CODE AND A.table_id = @TABLE_ID AND A.auto_man = @PREFIX AND A.basis_date = @BASIS_DATE
IF @@ROWCOUNT = 0 SET @MaxSeq = 0
WHILE (@TmpMaxSeq > @FixSeq AND @MaxSeq != 0) BEGIN SET @BASIS_DATE = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(8), DATEADD(DAY, 1, @BASIS_DATE), 112)
UPDATE A SET @TmpMaxSeq = A.last_seq + 1 , @MaxSeq = A.last_seq = CASE WHEN A.last_seq + 1 > @FixSeq THEN A.last_seq ELSE A.last_seq + 1 END FROM BAUTONOT A WITH (ROWLOCK) WHERE A.comp_code = @COMP_CODE AND A.div_code = @DIV_CODE AND A.table_id = @TABLE_ID AND A.auto_man = @PREFIX AND A.basis_date = @BASIS_DATE
IF @@ROWCOUNT = 0 SET @MaxSeq = 0 END
IF @MaxSeq = 0 BEGIN SET @MaxSeq = 1
INSERT INTO BAUTONOT (comp_code, div_code, table_id, basis_date, auto_man, last_seq) VALUES (@COMP_CODE, @DIV_CODE, @TABLE_ID, @BASIS_DATE, @PREFIX, 1) END
/* 업무특성상 별도채번 방법 적용 */ SET @sAUTO_NUM = @PREFIX + RIGHT(@BASIS_DATE,6) + RIGHT('0000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, @MAXSEQ), 5)
SELECT @sAUTO_NUM AS LOT_NO END
